I want my own shop.
I want to own my own shop.
I don't know why Tom didn't come yesterday.
zh: 我不知道为什么汤姆昨天没来。

en: Tom was born in that hospital.
zh: 汤姆在那家医院出生的。

en: I know some people who can help you.
zh: 我认识一些能帮助你的人。

en: I know somebody who can help you.
zh: 我认识一个能帮助你的人。

en: She loved to travel.
She has a foreign car.
Was this added by mistake?
zh: 这是不是不小心添加的？

en: Should this be deleted?
At last, I managed to find Tom.
Tom's cheeks were bright red.
There’s no time!
There’s no time for that!
You haven't gone to bed yet?
You're not asleep yet?
Lisa's birthday is in two months.
zh: 丽莎的生日还有两个月。

en: It's too heavy. I can't lift it.
It's too heavy for me to lift.
zh: 这对我来说太重了，我举不起来。

en: I left Boston last year and haven't yet been back.
zh: 我去年离开了波士顿，还没回去过。

en: Tom's parents love me.
Tom's sisters are both beautiful.
Both of Tom's sisters are beautiful.
zh: 汤姆的两个姐妹都很漂亮。

en: Don't just sit there. Start taking notes.
zh: 别光坐在那儿，开始记笔记。

en: Please keep an eye on my kids.
zh: 请帮我照看一下我的孩子们。

en: Please try to always keep an eye on your child.
zh: 请尽量时刻照看好你的孩子。

en: How many ways do you know how to do that?
zh: 你知道有多少种方法可以做到那件事？

en: My mother and my father are both teachers.
zh: 我妈妈和我爸爸都是老师。

en: Both my mother and my father are teachers.
zh: 我妈妈和我爸爸都是老师。

en: I heard sirens in the distance.
I might come tomorrow.
Maybe I'll come tomorrow.
Tom and Mary gave exactly the same answers on the test, which made the teacher suspicious.
zh: 汤姆和玛丽在考试中给出了完全相同的答案，这引起了老师的怀疑。

en: Tom broke all the eggs.
zh: 汤姆把所有的鸡蛋都打碎了。

en: Tom dropped the eggs and they all broke.
zh: 汤姆把鸡蛋掉了，而且都碎了。

en: Tom can crack an egg with one hand.
Why haven't you gone to bed yet?
"My dad doesn't drink." "Mine doesn't either."
What is a furry?
This game brings back memories.
zh: 这个游戏勾起了我的回忆。

en: Ask Tom if he can understand French.
zh: 问问汤姆是否能听懂法语。

en: You should leave Tom alone.
Tom is now in a hospital in Boston.
zh: 汤姆现在在波士顿的一家医院里。

en: "I don't know," said Tom.
I won't be teaching you how to behave, Tom.
zh: 我不会教你如何举止，汤姆。

en: What kind of person do you want to be?
These pancakes taste good.
These pancakes are delicious.
When did Tom start doing that?
zh: 汤姆是什么时候开始做那件事的？

en: I'll study French at home.
English grammar is my enemy.
It can't be repaired.
It can't be mended.
I'd like to be Tom's girlfriend, but he already has one.
zh: 我想当汤姆的女朋友，但他已经有女朋友了。

en: The cat likes fish, but doesn't like getting its paws wet.
zh: 猫喜欢鱼，但不喜欢爪子弄湿。

en: I'm thinking of starting my own company eventually.
zh: 我正在考虑最终自己创业。

en: If the laundry is dry, bring it in.
zh: 如果衣服干了，就拿进来。

en: Bring in the laundry when it's dry.
About this time tomorrow, we'll be in Boston.
zh: 大约明天这个时候，我们会在波士顿。

en: Get your dirty paws off me.
zh: 把你的脏爪子从我身上拿开。

en: Do you know its etymology?
I wonder how many people born in the 19th century are still alive.
zh: 我想知道有多少出生在19世纪的人还活着。

en: Hug me. I'm scared.
Am I mistaken in some way?
zh: 我是在什么地方搞错了吗？

en: If you invite Tom, he'll probably come.
zh: 如果你邀请汤姆，他可能会来。

en: I don't know why Tom didn't tell the truth.
zh: 我不知道为什么汤姆没有说实话。

en: I visited the village Tom was born in.
zh: 我参观了汤姆出生的村庄。

en: A lot of people have asked me why I like doing this.
zh: 很多人问我为什么我喜欢做这件事。

en: We've got a real blizzard going on here?
zh: 我们这里正在刮一场真正的暴风雪，是吗？

en: We've got a real blizzard here.
zh: 我们这里正在刮一场真正的暴风雪。

en: I spoke with Tom for thirty minutes.
zh: 我和汤姆谈了三十分钟。

en: If Tom had gotten Mary's advice, he would've succeeded.
zh: 如果汤姆听了玛丽的建议，他就会成功了。

en: Why did you give him your shoes?
zh: 你为什么把你的鞋子给他？

en: What does love taste like?
My little brother never helps around the house.
zh: 我弟弟从不帮忙做家务。

en: It looks like Tom is already here.
It looks like Tom isn't having any fun.
zh: 看起来汤姆玩得不太开心。

en: Because his parents got divorced, Tom had hardly any contact with his father.
zh: 因为他父母离婚了，汤姆几乎和他父亲没有任何联系。

en: I've been having tuna and mayo onigiri recently.
zh: 我最近一直在吃金枪鱼蛋黄酱饭团。

en: Yesterday Mary smiled at me.
Mary smiled at me yesterday.
Tom's annual income is more than $100,000.
zh: 汤姆的年收入超过十万美元。

en: Tom Jackson's book is very interesting.
zh: 汤姆·杰克逊的书非常有趣。

en: I have a round trip ticket to Boston.
zh: 我有一张去波士顿的往返票。

en: You're mistaken. Tom plays the clarinet, not the saxophone.
zh: 你搞错了。汤姆吹的是单簧管，不是萨克斯。

en: You're wrong. Tom plays the clarinet, not the saxophone.
zh: 你错了。汤姆吹的是单簧管，不是萨克斯。

en: I'm to meet Tom at 2:30.
zh: 我约好两点半和汤姆见面。

en: Don't forget to get vaccinated.
I'm going to pass out if I don't sit down.
zh: 如果我不坐下，我就要晕倒了。

en: Do I have a cold?
Do I have a flu?
I'm busy this week.
I can't dye my hair. My mom would kill me!
zh: 我不能染头发。我妈会杀了我的！

en: This week, I'm busy.
What's the difference between an epidemic and a pandemic?
zh: 流行病和大流行有什么区别？

en: Do you need the car?
I don't think it'll stop raining.
The noise suddenly stopped.
I didn't drink milk.
I'm walking right now.
It doesn't cost as much as I thought.
